name: SF_Character_Controller
description:
Not optimized, therefore it has a big file size. (apk works only together with a gamepad (inventory does not work in .apk))

Inputs as following ...

Keyboard Input:

MOUSE MOVEMENT - camera movement

W,A,S,D - player movement

SHIFT - sprint
SPACE - jump

R - roll

if you equipped something in the inventory*

UP,DOWN,LEFT,RIGHT - quick swap items

    -> UP,DOWN - Items

    -> LEFT - Spells

    -> RIGHT - Weapon

LEFT MOUSE - light_attack, if weapon is eqipped

RIGHT MOUSE - heavy_attack

MIDDLE MOUSE - magic attack if equipped

F - aim when near enemy

H - use item

E - interact / pick up items

I - open inventory

PS4(XBox) Controller Input:

LEFT STICK - camera movement

RIGHT STICK - player movement

L2 - sprint

CROSSS - jump

CIRCLE - roll

if you equipped something in the inventory*

CROSSHAIR INPUT - quick swap items

    -> UP,DOWN - Items

    -> LEFT - Spells

    -> RIGHT - Weapon

R1 - light_attack, if weapon is eqipped

R2 - heavy_attack

L1 - magic attack if equipped

SHARE_BUTTON - aim when near enemy

SQUARE - use item

TRIANGLE - interact / pick up items

*INVENTORY:

Grab spells and move them to the equip slots
with mouse and left_mouse_button

or joystick and cross_buton

with UP,DOWN (CROSSHAIR) you can change the active slot

Additionally:

sprint/movement with weapon is slightly slower than unequipped

you can only target an enemy when weapon is equipped
